sentences.sContent: We have people coming from all around the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have people coming from all around the world.
sentences.sCn: 我们那里有来自世界各地的人。

sentences.sContent: (Applause.) Together, they represent the great potential and expectations of young people around the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: (Applause.) Together, they represent the great potential and expectations of young people around the world.
sentences.sCn: （掌声）他们共同代表着世界各地年轻人的极大潜力和期望。

sentences.sContent: Thanks to all the fans who make this tournament the best in the world and thanks to my family who travel with me around the world and make it all possible.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thanks to all the fans who make this tournament the best in the world and thanks to my family who travel with me around the world and make it all possible.
sentences.sCn: 非常谢谢所有球迷，是你们让这次的比赛变得如此的精彩，感谢我的家人，他们陪伴我在世界各地旅行，使他们让这一切成真。

synos.tran: 世界各地；全世界；环游世界
